content.description: A fun, gym-like warmup! Good rock quality and fun movement on large jugs, and an easy to envision top out. A wider span might help you out here, but nonetheless an easy route. Beta below: Sit start spread eagle on two great juggy sidepulls, a low left foot, and a right foot heel hook on a ginormous ledge. Punch your right hand up to the ledge, work your left foot up, and trend towards the left on large sidepulls, jugs, and the left hand crack. With large holds and big feet all the way up, this one can be done however works for you!
content.protection: 2-3 pads. The landing is a bit surf's up, so a spotter may be beneficial
content.location: The farthest right boulder on the chalet boulders cliff line.

content.description: A cliff band located opposite of the top chalet at Spirit Mountain. This area needs lots of cleaning, but shows promise for a few cool lines on good quality rock! Close proximity to the top chalet and some bike trails means that you'll probably run into other people enjoying the outdoors here, so please be courteous!
